title: Responsive Teaching Methodology Workshop for Chemistry Education: Deepening Pre-Service Teachers' Conceptual Understanding

context.prior_knowledge: Core secondary chemistry curriculum knowledge and lesson design experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on discussion and reflective activities in a smartphone-based LMS environment, a program to improve chemistry concept teaching methods for in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can design and interpret surveys analyzing learners' prior conceptions.
Learners can identify academic connections in students' thinking processes and apply them to instructional design.
Learners can reconstruct their cognitive frameworks for chemistry concepts (e.g., evaporation and boiling) by applying responsive teaching methods.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
